user_question: Can you explain the concept of quantum entanglement using a metaphor involving cats and dogs?
final_answer: Quantum entanglement can be metaphorically explained as two pets, a cat and a dog, that are so deeply connected that when one barks, the other meows, regardless of the distance between them. [Image: Cartoon of a cat and a dog with entangled leashes, barking and meowing simultaneously.]
